mcq.statement: Some photosynthetic organisms contain chloroplasts that lack photosystem II yet can survive. The best way to detect the "lack of photosystem II" in these organisms would be ______?

options.a: To determine if they have thylakoids in the chloroplasts
options.b: To do experiments to generate an action spectrum
options.c: To test for liberation of O2 in the light
options.d: To test for CO2 fixation in the dark
